summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4006 for the improvement of 37th Avenue Northeast and 38th Avenue Northeast, each from East 55th Street to East 57th Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48628, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
